entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
